part2_content: Describe an interesting discussion you had with your friend You should say: What the discussion was about What opinions you and your friend had Why you think the discussion was interesting And how you felt about it

What you know about his/her job
Whether it is his/her only job

part2_content:
Describe a time you made a promise to someone
You should say
What the promise was
To whom you made it
Whether it was easy or difficult to keep
And explain why you made it

Do children keep their promises?
Do parents in China make promise to their children?
What kinds of promises do people often make?
Do you often keep your promises?

part2_content:
Describe an important decision that you made
You should say:
What the decision was
How you made your decision

Do you like to cook at home?

part2_content:
Describe an object that you think is beautiful

Where you saw it

You should say:

What the photo was about
And explain why you enjoy looking at it

part2_content:
Describe a photo you took that you are proud of
You should say:
When you took it
Where you took it
What is in this photo
